DOC.brief_title: A Study 1018 Immunostimulatory Sequence ( ISS ) Administered With Irinotecan Cetuximab Treat Patients With Previously Treated Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I , open-label study escalate dose level 1018 ISS combination irinotecan cetuximab patient previously treat metastatic colorectal cancer . Approximately 15 patient treat . The objective study establish safe , tolerable , active dose 1018 ISS , determine tumor response , time disease progression , overall survival treat patient . The safety tolerability 1018 ISS evaluate periodic laboratory assessment , physical examination , compilation adverse event . Once study patient consent , screen , assign one dose level 1018 ISS , patient receive two 4 week cycle 1018 ISS therapy plus irinotecan every week cetuximab weekly . Irinotecan cetuximab continue thereafter disease progression , unacceptable toxicity , patient refuse treatment .
